00057         public function __construct(F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager $componentManager, F3_MailformPlusPlus_Configuration $configuration) {

00059                 $this->configuration = $configuration;

00069         protected function init() {
00070                 global $LANG;
00071                 $LANG->includeLLFile('EXT:mailformplusplus/Resources/Language/locallang.xml');
00072                 $this->logTable = 'tx_mailformplusplus_log';
00073         }
00074         
00081         public function process() {
00082                 global $LANG;
00083                 
00084                 //init 
00085                 $this->init();
00086                 
00087                 //init gp params
00088                 $params = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00089                 
00090                 //should delete records
00091                 if($params[delete] && isset($params['markedUids']) && is_array($params['markedUids'])) {
00092                         
00093                         //delete records
00094                         $this->deleteRecords($params['markedUids']);
00095                         
00096                         //select all records
00097                         $records = $this->fetchRecords();
00098                         
00099                         //show table
00100                         $table = $this->getTable($records);
00101                         
00102                         return $table;
00103                 }
00104                 
00105                 //should show index
00106                 if(!$params['detailId'] && !$params['markedUids']) {
00107                         
00108                         //if log table doesn't exist, show error
00109                         $tables = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->admin_get_tables();
00110                         if(!in_array($this->logTable,array_keys($tables))) {
00111                                 return $this->getErrorMessage();
00112                                 
00113                         //show index table
00114                         } else {
00115                                 
00116                                 //select all records
00117                                 $records = $this->fetchRecords();
00118                                 
00119                                 //show table
00120                                 $table = $this->getTable($records);
00121                                 return $table;
00122                         }
00123                         
00124                 //should export to some format
00125                 } elseif(!$params['delete']) {
00126                         
00127                         //should show detail view of a single record
00128                         if(!$params['renderMethod']) {
00129                                 
00130                                 return $this->showSingleView($params['detailId']);
00131                                 
00132                         //PDF generation
00133                         } elseif(!strcasecmp($params['renderMethod'],"pdf")) {
00134                                 
00135                                 //render a single record to PDF
00136                                 if($params['detailId']) {
00137                                         return $this->generatePDF($params['detailId']);
00138                                         
00139                                 //render many records to PDF
00140                                 } elseif(isset($params['markedUids']) && is_array($params['markedUids'])) {
00141                                         return $this->generatePDF($params['markedUids']);
00142                                 }
00143                                 
00144                         //CSV
00145                         } elseif(!strcasecmp($params['renderMethod'],"csv")) {
00146                                 
00147                                 //save single record as CSV
00148                                 if($params['detailId']) {
00149                                         return $this->generateCSV($params['detailId']);
00150                                         
00151                                 //save many records as CSV
00152                                 } elseif(isset($params['markedUids']) && is_array($params['markedUids'])) {
00153                                         return $this->generateCSV($params['markedUids']);
00154                                 }
00155                                 
00156                         }
00157                 }
00158         }
00159         
00167         protected function deleteRecords($uids) {
00168                 $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_DELETEquery($this->logTable,"uid IN (".implode(",",$uids).")");
00169         }
00170         
00180         protected function generatePDF($detailId) {
00181                 
00182                 /* 
00183                  * if there is only one record to export, initialize an array with the one uid
00184                  * to ensure that foreach loops will not crash
00185                  */
00186                 if(!is_array($detailId)) {
00187                         $detailId = array($detailId);
00188                 }
00189                 
00190                 //init gp params
00191                 $gp = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00192                 
00193                 //select the records
00194                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery("uid,pid,crdate,ip,params",$this->logTable,"uid IN (".implode(",",$detailId).")");
00195                 
00196                 //if records were found
00197                 if($res && $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res) > 0) {
00198                         $records = array();
00199                         $allParams = array();
00200                         
00201                         //loop through records
00202                         while($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res)) {
00203                                 
00204                                 //unserialize params and save the array
00205                                 $row['params'] = unserialize($row['params']);
00206                                 $records[] = $row;
00207                                 if(!is_array($row['params'])) {
00208                                         $row['params'] = array();
00209                                 }
00210                                 
00211                                 //sum up all params for selection view
00212                                 $allParams = array_merge($allParams,$row['params']);
00213                         }
00214                         
00215                         //if fields were chosen in selection view, export the records using the selected fields
00216                         if(isset($gp['exportParams'])) {
00217                                 $generator = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_Generator_PDF");
00218                                 $generator->generateModulePDF($records,$gp['exportParams']);
00219                                 
00220                         /*
00221                          * show selection view to find out which fields to export.
00222                          * This enables the user to get rid of fields like submitted or mp-step
00223                          */
00224                         } else {
00225                                 return $this->generatePDFExportFieldsSelector($allParams);
00226                         }       
00227                 }
00228         }
00229         
00240         protected function generateCSV($detailId) {
00241                 
00242                 /* 
00243                  * if there is only one record to export, initialize an array with the one uid
00244                  * to ensure that foreach loops will not crash
00245                  */
00246                 if(!is_array($detailId)) {
00247                         $detailId = array($detailId);
00248                 }
00249                 
00250                 //init gp params
00251                 $params = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00252                 
00253                 //select the records to export
00254                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery("uid,pid,crdate,ip,params,key_hash",$this->logTable,"uid IN (".implode(",",$detailId).")");
00255                 
00256                 //if record were found
00257                 if($res && $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res) > 0) {
00258                         $records = array();
00259                         $count = 0;
00260                         $hashes = array();
00261                         $availableFormats = array();
00262                         
00263                         //loop through records
00264                         while($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res)) {
00265                                 
00266                                 //unserialize the params array
00267                                 $row['params'] = unserialize($row['params']);
00268                                 
00269                                 //find the amount of different formats to inform the user.
00270                                 if(!in_array($row['key_hash'],$hashes)) {
00271                                         $hashes[] = $row['key_hash'];
00272                                         $availableFormats[] = $row['params'];
00273                                 }
00274                                 $records[] = $row;
00275                         }
00276                         
00277                         $availableFormatsCount = count($hashes);
00278                         
00279                         //only one format found
00280                         if($availableFormatsCount == 1) {
00281                                 
00282                                 //if fields were chosen in the selection view, perform the export
00283                                 if(isset($params['exportParams'])) {
00284                                         $generator = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_Generator_CSV");
00285                                         $generator->generateModuleCSV($renderRecords,$params['exportParams']);
00286                                         
00287                                 //no fields chosen, show selection view.
00288                                 } else {
00289                                         return $this->generateCSVExportFieldsSelector($renderRecords[0]['params']);
00290                                 }
00291                                 
00292                         //more than one format and user has chosen a format to export
00293                         } elseif(isset($params['csvFormat'])) {
00294                                 
00295                                 //select the format
00296                                 $format = $hashes[$params['csvFormat']];
00297                                 $renderRecords = array();
00298                                 
00299                                 //find out which records belong to this format
00300                                 foreach($records as $record) {
00301                                         if(!strcmp($record['key_hash'],$format)) {
00302                                                 $renderRecords[] = $record;
00303                                         }
00304                                 }
00305                                 
00306                                 //if fields were chosen in the selection view, perform the export
00307                                 if(isset($params['exportParams'])) {
00308                                         $generator = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_Generator_CSV");
00309                                         $generator->generateModuleCSV($renderRecords,$params['exportParams']);
00310                                         
00311                                 //no fields chosen, show selection view.
00312                                 } else {
00313                                         return $this->generateCSVExportFieldsSelector($renderRecords[0]['params']);
00314                                 }
00315                                 
00316                         //more than one format and none chosen by now, show format selection view.
00317                         } else {
00318                                 return $this->generateFormatsSelector($availableFormats,$detailId);
00319                         }
00320                 }
00321         }
00322         
00331         protected function generateCSVExportFieldsSelector($params) {
00332                 global $LANG;
00333                 
00334                 //if there are no params, initialize the array to ensure that foreach loops will not crash
00335                 if(!is_array($params)) {
00336                         $params = array();
00337                 }
00338                 
00339                 //init gp params
00340                 $gp = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00341                                 
00342                 //header
00343                 $selector = '<h3>' . $LANG->getLL('select_export_fields') . '</h3><br />';
00344                 $selector .= '
00345                         <div style="width:200px;float:right">
00346                                 <input type="button" onclick="selectAll()" value="'.$LANG->getLL('select_all').'" />
00347                                 <input type="button" onclick="deselectAll()" value="'.$LANG->getLL('deselect_all').'" />
00348                         </div>
00349                 ';
00350                 
00351                 //start form with hidden fields holding the values of params of the steps before
00352                 $selector .= '<form id="mailformplusplus_module_form" action="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'" method="post">';
00353                 
00354                 //the selected format to export
00355                 $selector .= '<input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[csvFormat]" value="'.$gp['csvFormat'].'" />';
00356                 
00357                 //the selected render method (csv/pdf), should be csv here
00358                 $selector .= '<input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[renderMethod]" value="'.$gp['renderMethod'].'" />';
00359                 
00360                 /* 
00361                  * if there is only one record to export, initialize an array with the one uid
00362                  * to ensure that foreach loops will not crash.
00363                  * UIDs could be in param "markedUids" if more records where selected or in "detailId" if only one record get exported.
00364                  */
00365                 $detailId = $gp['markedUids'];
00366                 if(!$detailId) {
00367                         $detailId = $gp['detailId'];
00368                 }
00369                 if(!is_array($detailId)) {
00370                         $detailId = array($detailId);
00371                 }
00372                 
00373                 //the selected records in a previous step
00374                 foreach($detailId as $id) {
00375                         $selector .= '<input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[markedUids][]" value="'.$id.'" />';
00376                 }
00377                 
00378                 //start output table
00379                 $selector .= '<table>';
00380                 
00381                 //add a label and a checkbox for each available parameter
00382                 foreach($params as $field=>$value) {
00383                         $selector .= '<tr><td><input type="checkbox" name="mailformplusplus[exportParams][]" value="'.$field.'">'.$field.'</td></tr>';
00384                 }
00385                 
00386                 //add submite button and close form
00387                 $selector .= '</table><input type="submit" value="'.$LANG->getLL('export').'" /></form>';
00388                 
00389                 //add javascript for "select all" and "deselect all"
00390                 $selector .= $this->getSelectionJS();
00391                 return $selector;
00392         }

00402         protected function generatePDFExportFieldsSelector($params) {
00403                 global $LANG;
00404                 
00405                 //if there are no params, initialize the array to ensure that foreach loops will not crash
00406                 if(!is_array($params)) {
00407                         $params = array();
00408                 }
00409                 
00410                 //init gp params
00411                 $gp = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00412                 
00413                 //header
00414                 $selector = '<h3>' . $LANG->getLL('select_export_fields') . '</h3><br />';
00415                 $selector .= '
00416                         <div style="width:200px;float:right">
00417                                 <input type="button" onclick="selectAll()" value="'.$LANG->getLL('select_all').'" />
00418                                 <input type="button" onclick="deselectAll()" value="'.$LANG->getLL('deselect_all').'" />
00419                         </div>
00420                 ';
00421                 
00422                 //start form with hidden fields holding the values of params of the steps before
00423                 $selector .= '<form id="mailformplusplus_module_form" action="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'" method="post">';
00424                 
00425                 //the selected render method (csv/pdf), should be pdf here
00426                 $selector .= '<input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[renderMethod]" value="'.$gp['renderMethod'].'" />';
00427                 
00428                 /* 
00429                  * if there is only one record to export, initialize an array with the one uid
00430                  * to ensure that foreach loops will not crash.
00431                  * UIDs could be in param "markedUids" if more records where selected or in "detailId" if only one record get exported.
00432                  */
00433                 $detailId = $gp['markedUids'];
00434                 if(!$detailId) {
00435                         $detailId = $gp['detailId'];
00436                 }
00437                 if(!is_array($detailId)) {
00438                         $detailId = array($detailId);
00439                 }
00440                 
00441                 //the selected records in a previous step
00442                 foreach($detailId as $id) {
00443                         $selector .= '<input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[markedUids][]" value="'.$id.'" />';
00444                 }
00445                 
00446                 //start output table with the default fields that can be exported (ip address, submission date and PID)
00447                 $selector .= '<table>';
00448                 $selector .= '<tr><td><input type="checkbox" name="mailformplusplus[exportParams][]" value="ip">'.$LANG->getLL('ip_address').'</td></tr>';
00449                 $selector .= '<tr><td><input type="checkbox" name="mailformplusplus[exportParams][]" value="submission_date">'.$LANG->getLL('submission_date').'</td></tr>';
00450                 $selector .= '<tr><td><input type="checkbox" name="mailformplusplus[exportParams][]" value="pid">'.$LANG->getLL('page_id').'</td></tr>';
00451                 $selector .= '</table>';
00452                 $selector .= '<table>';
00453                 
00454                 //add a label and a checkbox for each available parameter
00455                 foreach($params as $field=>$value) {
00456                         $selector .= '<tr><td><input type="checkbox" name="mailformplusplus[exportParams][]" value="'.$field.'">'.$field.'</td></tr>';
00457                 }
00458                 
00459                 //add submit button and close form
00460                 $selector .= '</table><input type="submit" value="'.$LANG->getLL('export').'" /></form>';
00461                 
00462                 //add javascript for "select all" and "deselect all"
00463                 $selector .= $this->getSelectionJS();
00464                 return $selector;
00465         }
00466         
00473         protected function getSelectionJS() {
00474                 return '<script type="text/javascript">
00475                                 function selectAll() {
00476                                   var form = document.getElementById("mailformplusplus_module_form");
00477                                   var inputs = form.getElementsByTagName("input");
00478                                   for(var i=0;i<inputs.length;i++) {
00479                                     if(inputs[i].type == "checkbox") {
00480                                       inputs[i].checked = "checked";    
00481                                         }       
00482                                   }     
00483                                 }
00484                                 
00485                                 function deselectAll() {
00486                                   var form = document.getElementById("mailformplusplus_module_form");
00487                                   var inputs = form.getElementsByTagName("input");
00488                                   for(var i=0;i<inputs.length;i++) {
00489                                     if(inputs[i].type == "checkbox") {
00490                                       inputs[i].checked = null; 
00491                                         }       
00492                                   }     
00493                                 }
00494                         </script>
00495                 ';
00496         }

00507         protected function generateFormatsSelector($formats,$detailId) {
00508                 global $LANG;
00509                 /* 
00510                  * if there is only one record to export, initialize an array with the one uid
00511                  * to ensure that foreach loops will not crash.
00512                  */
00513                 if(!is_array($detailId)) {
00514                         $detailId = array($detailId);
00515                 }
00516                 
00517                 //header
00518                 $selector .= '<h3>'.sprintf($LANG->getLL('formats_found'),count($formats)).'</h3><br />';
00519                 
00520                 //start table
00521                 $selector .= '<table>';
00522                 
00523                 //loop through formats
00524                 foreach($formats as $key=>$format) {
00525                         
00526                         //if format is valid
00527                         if(isset($format) && is_array($format)) {
00528                                 
00529                                 //start a form
00530                                 $selector .= '
00531                                         <tr><td>
00532                                                         <form action="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'" method="post">
00533                                 ';
00534                                 
00535                                 //add hidden fields for all selected records to export
00536                                 foreach($detailId as $id) {
00537                                         $selector .= '<input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[markedUids][]" value="'.$id.'" />';
00538                                 }
00539                                 
00540                                 //add hidden fields for the current format and the render method CSV
00541                                 $selector .= '
00542                                                         <input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[csvFormat]" value="'.$key.'" />
00543                                                         <input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[renderMethod]" value="csv" />
00544                                                         <input type="submit" value="'.$LANG->getLL('export').'" />
00545                                                         </form>
00546                                                 </td>
00547                                                 <td>'.implode(",",array_keys($format)).'</td>
00548                                         </tr>
00549                                 ';
00550                         }
00551                 }
00552                 
00553                 //close table, add back link and return
00554                 $selector .= '</table><br /><hr /><a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'">'.$LANG->getLL('back').'</a>';
00555                 return $selector;
00556         }
00557         
00565         protected function showSingleView($singleUid) {
00566                 global $LANG;
00567                 
00568                 //select the record
00569                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery("uid,pid,crdate,ip,params",$this->logTable,"uid=".$singleUid);
00570                 
00571                 //if UID was valid
00572                 if($res && $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res) > 0) {
00573                         $row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res);
00574                         
00575                         //unserialize params
00576                         $params = unserialize($row['params']);
00577                         
00578                         //start with default fields (IP address, submission date, PID)
00579                         $view = '
00580                                 <div>
00581                                         <div>
00582                                                 <div style="width:100px;float:left"><h4>'.$LANG->getLL('page_id').'</h4></div>
00583                                                 <div style="width:100px;float:left">'.$row['pid'].'</div>
00584                                                 <div style="clear:both"></div>
00585                                         </div>
00586                                         <div>
00587                                                 <div style="width:100px;float:left"><h4>'.$LANG->getLL('crdate').'</h4></div>
00588                                                 <div style="width:200px;float:left">'.date("Y/m/d H:i",$row['crdate']).'</div>
00589                                                 <div style="clear:both"></div>
00590                                         </div>
00591                                         <div>
00592                                                 <div style="width:100px;float:left"><h4>'.$LANG->getLL('ip_address').'</h4></div>
00593                                                 <div style="width:100px;float:left">'.$row['ip'].'</div>
00594                                                 <div style="clear:both"></div>
00595                                         </div>
00596                                         <div>
00597                                                 <div style="width:100px;"><h4>'.$LANG->getLL('params').'</h4></div>
00598                                                 <div style="width:300px;margin-left:30px;">
00599                         ';
00600                         
00601                         //add the submitted params
00602                         if(isset($params) && is_array($params)) {
00603                                 $view .= '<table>';
00604                                 foreach($params as $key=>$value) {
00605                                         if(is_array($value)) {
00606                                                 $value = implode(",",$value);
00607                                         }
00608                                         $view .= '
00609                                                 <tr>
00610                                                         <td style="font-weight:bold">'.$key.'</td>
00611                                                         <td>'.$value.'</td>
00612                                                 </tr>
00613                                         ';
00614                                 }
00615                                 $view .= '</table>';
00616                         }
00617                         
00618                         //add buttons to export the record and a back link
00619                         $view .= '                      
00620                                                 </div>
00621                                         </div>
00622                                         <hr />
00623                                         <div>
00624                                                 <strong>'.$LANG->getLL('export_as').' </strong><a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?mailformplusplus[detailId]='.$row['uid'].'&mailformplusplus[renderMethod]=pdf">'.$LANG->getLL('pdf').'</a>
00625                                                 /<a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?mailformplusplus[detailId]='.$row['uid'].'&mailformplusplus[renderMethod]=csv">'.$LANG->getLL('csv').'</a>
00626                                         </div>
00627                                         <div style="margin-top:30px;font-weight:bold;text-decoration:underline;">
00628                                                 <a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'">'.$LANG->getLL('back').'</a>
00629                                         </div>
00630                                 </div>
00631                         ';
00632                         return $view;
00633                 }
00634         }

00642         protected function getErrorMessage() {
00643                 return '
00644                         <div style="color:dd7777;font-weight:bold;font-size:11px;">
00645                                 <br />
00646                                 <p style="color:dd7777;font-weight:bold;font-size:11px;">'.$LANG->getLL('noLogTable').'</p>
00647                                 <br />
00648                                 <br />
00649                                 <p style="color:dd7777;font-weight:bold;font-size:11px;">TypoScript:</p><br />
00650                                 <span style="font-family:Monospace;color:dd7777;font-weight:bold;font-size:11px;">
00651                                         plugin.F3_MailformPlusPlus.settings.loggers.1 {<br />
00652                                                 class = F3_MailformPlusPlus_Logger_Default      <br />
00653                                         } <br />
00654                                 </span>
00655                         </div>
00656                 ';
00657         }
00658         
00665         protected function fetchRecords() {
00666                 $records = array();
00667                 
00668                 //build WHERE clause
00669                 $where = $this->buildWhereClause();
00670                 
00671                 //select the records
00672                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery("uid,pid,crdate,ip,params",$this->logTable,$where);
00673                 
00674                 //if records found
00675                 if($res && $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res) > 0) {
00676                         $count = 0;
00677                         while($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res)) {
00678                                 $records[$count] = $row;
00679                                 $count++;
00680                         }
00681                 }
00682                 return $records;
00683         }
00684         
00691         protected function buildWhereClause() {
00692                 
00693                 //init gp params
00694                 $params = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00695                 $where = array();
00696                 
00697                 //if only records of a specific PID should be shown
00698                 if(strlen(trim($params['pidFilter'])) > 0) {
00699                         $where[] = "pid IN (".$params['pidFilter'].")";
00700                 }
00701                 
00702                 //only records submitted after given timestamp
00703                 if(strlen(trim($params['startdateFilter'])) > 0) {
00704                         $tstamp = $this->dateToTimestamp($params['startdateFilter']);
00705                         $where[] = "crdate >= ".$tstamp;
00706                 }
00707                 
00708                 //only records submitted before given timestamp
00709                 if(strlen(trim($params['enddateFilter'])) > 0) {
00710                         $tstamp = $this->dateToTimestamp($params['enddateFilter'],true);
00711                         $where[] = "crdate <= ".$tstamp;
00712                 }
00713                 
00714                 //if filter was applied, return the WHERE clause
00715                 if(count($where) > 0) {
00716                         return implode(" AND ",$where);
00717                 }
00718         }
00719         
00728         protected function dateToTimestamp($date,$end = false) {
00729                 $dateArr = explode(".",$date);
00730                 if($end) {
00731                         return mktime(23,59,59,$dateArr[1],$dateArr[0],$dateArr[2]);
00732                 }
00733                 return mktime(0,0,0,$dateArr[1],$dateArr[0],$dateArr[2]);
00734         }
00735         
00742         protected function getFilterSection() {
00743                 global $LANG;
00744                 
00745                 //init gp params
00746                 $params = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00747                 
00748                 //generate form
00749                 $filter = '
00750                         <form action="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'" method="post">
00751                         <div>
00752                                 <h2 style="text-align:center">'.$LANG->getLL('filter').'</h2>
00753                                 <table>
00754                                         <tr>
00755                                                 <td><strong>'.$LANG->getLL('pid_label').'</strong></td>
00756                                                 <td>
00757                                                         <input type="text" name="mailformplusplus[pidFilter]" value="'.$params['pidFilter'].'"/>
00758                                                 </td>
00759                                         </tr>
00760                                         <tr>
00761                                                 <td><strong>'.$LANG->getLL('startdate').'</strong></td>
00762                                                 <td>
00763                                                         <input type="text" readonly="readonly" id="startdate" value="'.$params['startdateFilter'].'" name="mailformplusplus[startdateFilter]" />
00764                                                         <input type="button" id="trigger_startdate" value="'.$LANG->getLL('cal').'"/>
00765                                                 </td>
00766                                         </tr>
00767                                         <tr>
00768                                                 <td><strong>'.$LANG->getLL('enddate').'</strong></td>
00769                                                 <td>
00770                                                         <input type="text" readonly="readonly" id="enddate" value="'.$params['enddateFilter'].'" name="mailformplusplus[enddateFilter]" />
00771                                                         <input type="button" id="trigger_enddate" value="'.$LANG->getLL('cal').'"/>
00772                                                 </td>
00773                                         </tr>
00774                                         <tr>
00775                                                 <td><input type="submit" value="'.$LANG->getLL('filter').'" /></td>
00776                                                 <td>&nbsp;</td>
00777                                         </tr>
00778                                 </table>
00779                         </div>
00780                         </form>';
00781                         
00782                 //add JavaScript for Popup calendar
00783                 $filter .= '
00784                         <hr />
00785                 ';
00786                 $filter .= $this->getCalendarJS();
00787                         
00788                 return $filter;
00789         }
00790 
00797         protected function getCalendarJS() {
00798                 return '<style type="text/css">@import url(../../../Resources/JS/jscalendar-1.0/skins/aqua/theme.css);</style>
00799                         <script type="text/javascript" src="../../../Resources/JS/jscalendar-1.0/calendar.js"></script>
00800                         <script type="text/javascript" src="../../../Resources/JS/jscalendar-1.0/lang/calendar-en.js"></script>
00801                         <script type="text/javascript" src="../../../Resources/JS/jscalendar-1.0/calendar-setup.js"></script>
00802 
00803                         <script type="text/javascript">
00804                                 Calendar.setup(
00805                                     {
00806                                       inputField  : "startdate",         // ID of the input field
00807                                       ifFormat    : "%d.%m.%Y",    // the date format
00808                                       button      : "trigger_startdate"       // ID of the button
00809                                     }
00810                                   );
00811                                  Calendar.setup(
00812                                     {
00813                                       inputField  : "enddate",         // ID of the input field
00814                                       ifFormat    : "%d.%m.%Y",    // the date format
00815                                       button      : "trigger_enddate"       // ID of the button
00816                                     }
00817                                   );
00818         
00819                         </script>
00820                 ';
00821         }
00822         
00830         protected function getTable(&$records) {
00831                 global $LANG;
00832                 
00833                 if(count($records) == 0) {
00834                         return "<div>'.$LANG->getLL('no_records').'</div>";
00835                 }
00836                 
00837                 
00838                 //init gp params
00839                 $params = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00840                 
00841                 //get filter
00842                 $table = $this->getFilterSection();
00843                 
00844                 //add JavaScript
00845                 $table .= $this->getSelectionJS();
00846                 
00847                 //add "Export as" and "Select all", "Deselect all" options
00848                 $table .= '
00849                         <form id="mailformplusplus_module_form" action="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'" method="post">
00850                         <div>
00851                         <div style="width:250px;float:left">
00852                                 ' . $LANG->getLL('export_as') . ': 
00853                                 <input type="submit" value="'.$LANG->getLL('pdf').'" name="mailformplusplus[renderMethod]" />
00854                                 <input type="submit" value="'.$LANG->getLL('csv').'" name="mailformplusplus[renderMethod]" />
00855                         </div>
00856                         <div style="width:200px;float:left;">
00857                                 <input type="submit" value="'.$LANG->getLL('delete_selected').'" name="mailformplusplus[delete]" />
00858                         </div>
00859                         <div style="width:200px;float:right">
00860                                 <input type="button" onclick="selectAll()" value="'.$LANG->getLL('select_all').'" />
00861                                 <input type="button" onclick="deselectAll()" value="'.$LANG->getLL('deselect_all').'" />
00862                         </div>
00863                         <div style="clear:both;"></div>
00864                         </div>
00865                 ';
00866                 
00867                 //start table
00868                 $table .= '
00869                         <!--<script src="../../../Resources/JS/sorttable.js"></script>-->
00870                         
00871                         <table class="sortable">
00872                                 <tr style="font-size:large;font-weight:bold;background: #cccccc;">
00873                                         <td>'.$LANG->getLL('page_id').'</th>
00874                                         <td>'.$LANG->getLL('submission_date').'</th>
00875                                         <td>'.$LANG->getLL('ip_address').'</th>
00876                                         <td>'.$LANG->getLL('detail_view').'</th>
00877                                         <td>'.$LANG->getLL('export').'</th>
00878                                         <td>&nbsp;</th>
00879                                 </tr>
00880                         ';
00881                 
00882                 $count = 1;
00883                 
00884                 //add records
00885                 foreach($records as $record) {
00886                         if($count % 2 == 0) {
00887                                 $style="";              
00888                         } else {
00889                                 $style="background-color:#dedede";
00890                         }
00891                         $table .= '
00892                                 <tr style="'.$style.'">
00893                                         <td>'.$record['pid'].'</td>
00894                                         <td>'.date('Y/m/d H:i',$record['crdate']).'</td>
00895                                         <td>'.$record['ip'].'</td>
00896                                         <td><a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?mailformplusplus[detailId]='.$record['uid'].'">'.$LANG->getLL('show').'</a></td>
00897                                         <td>
00898                                                 <a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?mailformplusplus[detailId]='.$record['uid'].'&mailformplusplus[renderMethod]=pdf">PDF</a>
00899                                                 /<a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?mailformplusplus[detailId]='.$record['uid'].'&mailformplusplus[renderMethod]=csv">CSV</a>
00900                                         </td>
00901                                         <td><input type="checkbox" name="mailformplusplus[markedUids][]" value="'.$record['uid'].'" ';
00902                                 if(isset($params['markedUids']) && is_array($params['markedUids']) && in_array($record['uid'],$params['markedUids'])) {
00903                                         $table .= 'checked="checked"';
00904                                 }
00905                                 $table .= '     
00906                                         /></td>
00907                                 </tr>
00908                         ';
00909                         $count++;
00910                 }
00911                 
00912                 //add Export as option
00913                 $table .= '
00914                         </table>
00915                         Export selected as: 
00916                         <input type="submit" value="PDF" name="mailformplusplus[renderMethod]" />
00917                         <input type="submit" value="CSV" name="mailformplusplus[renderMethod]" />
00918                         </form>
00919                 ';
00920                 return $table;
00921         }
00922
